Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface ContinuousRotatable

All Superinterfaces:
NodeProvider, Rotatable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity
public interface ContinuousRotatable
extends Rotatable
When implementing this Interface, a YaegerEntity will acquire the behaviour to perform a rotation on each Game World update, and thus give the illusion of a continuous rotation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default Updatable applyRotation()  
    double getRotationSpeed()
    Return the angle that should be added each update to the rotation of the YaegerEntity.
    void setRotationSpeed​(double angle)
    Set the angle at which this YaegerEntity will bew rotated at each update.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

    getGameNode

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.Rotatable

    setRotate

  • Method Details

    • getRotationSpeed

      double getRotationSpeed()
      Return the angle that should be added each update to the rotation of the YaegerEntity.
      Returns:
      The rotation angle in degrees as a double.

    • setRotationSpeed

      void setRotationSpeed​(double angle)
      Set the angle at which this YaegerEntity will bew rotated at each update. Note that a positive rotation value rotates the YaegerEntity counter clockwise, and a negative value rotates the YaegerEntity clockwise.
      Parameters:
      angle - The angle as a double.

    • applyRotation

      default Updatable applyRotation()
